rows.label: qst200809_msg0001
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst200809_msg0002
rows.name: What is the matter, miss?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0003
rows.name:
Why do you gaze upon our work
with such sadness?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0004
rows.name:
...Why don't people treat nature
with more respect?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0005
rows.name:
We are all part of nature.
You must know this?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0006
rows.name:
...Ah, I see. You love trees,
don't you, miss?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0007
rows.name:
Yes!
Trees, and wildflowers...
All plants are my friends.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0008
rows.name:
Friends, you say...
Such a kind child you are, miss.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0009
rows.name:
In any case, I'd like to assure you,
we do not treat nature roughly here.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0010
rows.name:
Huh?
...But...

rows.label: qst200809_msg0011
rows.name:
It is true, we do make our livelihood
humbly taking the lives of trees and
other plants.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0012
rows.name:
Mankind wouldn't really be able to
flourish otherwise...

rows.label: qst200809_msg0013
rows.name:
But that's exactly why we are more
thankful to the trees than anyone,
and treat them with respect.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0014
rows.name:
We in this lumberyard try not to waste
even the smallest bits of wood, going
to great lengths to find uses for them.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0015
rows.name: ...Wow, OK.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0016
rows.name:
I bet you'll make us the best tree brace
the world's ever seen!

rows.label: qst200809_msg0017
rows.name: Oh, is that what you needed?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0018
rows.name: Yeah! We need it to save a friend.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0019
rows.name:
Is that so? Well then,
I'll make sure myself it's a great one!

rows.label: qst200809_msg0020
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst200809_msg0021
rows.name:
Of course!
But before I can do that, you'll
have to bring me some Healing Teak.

rows.label: qst200809_msg0022
rows.name: All right!
